children.name: respondent_contact
children.hint: Enter text. Do not leave blank. Enter XXX if the information is not available.
children.label: 2.3 Contact Information: Mobile Number

bind.calculate: if(${mylga_state}='benue', ${mylga_lga_in_benue}, if(${mylga_state}='gombe', ${mylga_lga_in_gombe}, if(${mylga_state}='taraba', ${mylga_lga_in_taraba}, if(${mylga_state}='yobe', ${mylga_lga_in_yobe}, if(${mylga_state}='adamawa', ${mylga_lga_in_adamawa}, if(${mylga_state}='jigawa', ${mylga_lga_in_jigawa}, if(${mylga_state}='kaduna', ${mylga_lga_in_kaduna}, if(${mylga_state}='anambra', ${mylga_lga_in_anambra}, if(${mylga_state}='bauchi', ${mylga_lga_in_bauchi}, if(${mylga_state}='imo', ${mylga_lga_in_imo}, if(${mylga_state}='katsina', ${mylga_lga_in_katsina}, if(${mylga_state}='sokoto', ${mylga_lga_in_sokoto}, if(${mylga_state}='zamfara', ${mylga_lga_in_zamfara}, if(${mylga_state}='kebbi', ${mylga_lga_in_kebbi}, if(${mylga_state}='borno', ${mylga_lga_in_borno}, if(${mylga_state}='kano', ${mylga_lga_in_kano}, if(${mylga_state}='abia', ${mylga_lga_in_abia}, if(${mylga_state}='ebonyi', ${mylga_lga_in_ebonyi}, if(${mylga_state}='enugu', ${mylga_lga_in_enugu}, 'ERROR')))))))))))))))))))

children.name: school_address
children.label: 9. Street Address or Number and Street

children.name: school_code
children.hint: This should be the same code issued by the Ministry of Education and used in the census of schools. It is NOT the exam code. Do not leave blank. Enter XXX if the information is not available.
children.label: 10. School Code

children.name: level_of_education
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 11. What level of education does the school offer?

children.name: preprimary_and_primary
children.label: Nursery or pre-primary and primary school

children.name: primary_junior_and_senior_sec
children.label: Primary, junior and senior secondary school

children.name: nomadic_school_yn
children.hint: Please note through observation. Select ONLY one.
children.label: 12. Is this a nomadic school?

children.name: education_type
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 13. What type of education does the school offer?

children.name: religious_with_formal
children.label: Religious component with formal education (integrated curriculum or Islamiya)

children.name: school_managed
children.label: 14. Who runs or manages the school?

children.name: priv_noprofit
children.label: Charitable or  private not for profit

children.name: school_managed_other
children.hint: Enter text. Do not leave blank. Enter XXX if the information is not available.
children.label: 14.1 Please specify who manages the school.

children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available.

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of male and female students should equal total number of students.

children.name: note_num_ss_total_gender
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available.
children.label: 16.3 I would like to know what your enrollment for this school year is at Senior Secondary 1 though 3 levels:

children.name: road_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 17. Is there at least one road within 100 meters from this school that is large or wide enough to allow a vehicle to pass?

children.name: road_type
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 17.1 Please select the main type of road that is within 100m of this education facility.

children.name: dk
children.label: Information not available  or  Don’t know

children.name: road_type_other_specify
children.hint: Enter text. Do not leave blank. Enter XXX if the information is not available.
children.label: 17.2 Please specify other road type

children.name: all_weather_road_yn
children.hint: Can the children access the school even during the rainy season?
children.label: 17.3. Are most students able to come to school even when the main/regular route to school is not accessible?

children.name: dk
children.label: Information not available or Don't know

children.name: km_to_catchment_area
children.hint: Enter 0 if less than 1 KM
children.label: 18. How far is the school, in kilometers, from the areas it serves?

children.name: km_to_secondary_school
children.hint: Enter 0 if less than 1 KM OR 9999 if you are at a secondary school.
children.label: 19. What is the distance to the nearest secondary school (in kilometers)?

children.name: num_students_frthr_than_3km
children.hint: Please enter the number of students. If none then enter 0.
children.label: 20. Please estimate how many students live more than 3KM away from the school?

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of students living 3kms away from the school must be lower or equal to total number of students.

children.name: many_students
children.label: The number of students living more than 3KM away from school should be less or equal to total number of students.

children.name: students_travel_method
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 21. How do a MAJORITY of the students come to school?

children.name: students_travel_time
children.hint: The starting point will be the area where a majority of the students live or come from.
children.label: 22. Please estimate how long it takes students to come to school by ${students_travel_method}.

children.name: power_sources
children.hint: Select all that apply.
children.label: 23. What type(s) of power sources are available at this school?

children.name: grid
children.label: Grid connection or power (like PHNC, NEPA)

children.name: generator_funct_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 24.1 Is the generator connected and functional?

children.name: solar_funct_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 24.2 Is the solar system connected and functional?

children.name: grid_funct_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 24.3 Is the Grid or power (like PHCN, NEPA) connected and functional?

children.name: grid_proximity
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 25. How close do you estimate that the power lines of electricity grid (such as PHCN or NEPA) are to this location?

children.name: grid_within_500_m
children.label: Grid is within 500 meters of this location (but does not connect)

children.name: dk
children.label: Information not available  or  Don’t know

children.name: water
children.hint: Select all that apply.
children.label: 26. What IMPROVED water sources are there either on the premises or less than 100 meters away?

children.name: pipe_water_repair_time
children.hint: Functional means that the water source provided water for at least 7 days in the last month.
children.label: 27.1 Is the piped water system functional?

children.name: borehole_tubewell_repair_time
children.hint: Functional means that the water source provided water for at least 7 days in the last month.
children.label: 27.2 Is the borehole or tubewell water system functional?

children.name: protected_well_repair_time
children.hint: Functional means that the water source provided water for at least 7 days in the last month.
children.label: 27.3 Is the protected well water system functional?

children.name: days_no_potable_water
children.hint: Enter a number between 0-31 days.
children.label: 27.4 How many days in the last month was the school without any POTABLE water from any source?

children.name: toilet
children.hint: Select all that apply.
children.label: 28. What types of toilets are available on the premises?

children.name: flush_or_pour_flush_improved
children.label: Flush or water or pour flush to piped water system, to septic tank, to pit latrine

children.name: flush_or_pour_flush_unimproved
children.label: Flush toilet that is NOT connected to a piped water system, septic tank or pit latrine.

children.name: open_pit_latrine
children.label: Pit latrine without slab or open pit

children.name: flush_improved_functional_yn
children.hint: Functional means that the toilet functioned for at least 7 days in the last month.
children.label: 29.1 Are the flush or water or pour flush (to piped water system, to septic tank, to pit) toilets functional?

children.name: flush_unimproved_functional_yn
children.hint: Functional means that the toilet functioned for at least 7 days in the last month.
children.label: 29.2 Are the flush toilets (that are NOT connected to a piped water system, septic tank or pit latrine) functional?

children.name: vip_latrine_functional_yn
children.hint: Functional means that the toilet functioned for at least 7 days in the last month.
children.label: 29.3 Are the ventilated improved pit latrines functional?

children.name: slab_pit_latrine_functional_yn
children.hint: Functional means that the toilet functioned for at least 7 days in the last month.
children.label: 29.4 Are the pit latrines with slab functional?

children.name: open_pit_latrine_functional_yn
children.hint: Functional means that the toilet functioned for at least 7 days in the last month.
children.label: 29.5 Are the pit latrines without slab or open pit functional?

children.name: bucket_system_functional_yn
children.hint: Functional means that the toilet functioned for at least 7 days in the last month.
children.label: 29.6 Is the bucket system functional?

children.name: note_num_toilet
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available.
children.label: 30. How many toilets are there for:

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of toilets must equal the sum of boys, girls and common toilets.

children.name: note_ratio_student_to_toilet
children.label: Please check again the number of toilets. The number you have entered is either too high or too small.

children.name: phone_signal_strength
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 31. Choose one of the following to describe the STRONGEST mobile phone signal network at this point (in case there is more than one network).

children.name: none
children.label: None (No useable network coverage for voice calls)

children.name: low
children.label: Low (signal is weak or intermittent; calls often dropped)

children.name: high
children.label: High (signal is strong and consistent; dropped calls are rare

children.name: dk
children.label: Information not available  or  Don’t know

children.name: info_tech_available
children.hint: Select all that apply.
children.label: 32. Which of the following are available at the school, owned by the school, and currently functional?

children.name: mobile_phone
children.label: At least one mobile phone owned by the school (not a private number owned by a staff member)

children.name: note_num_tchrs
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available.
children.label: 33. What is the total number of full-time teachers at this school?

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of teachers must equal the sum of male and female teachers

children.name: note_teachers_more_than_20
children.label: Please check again the number of teachers. You have entered more than 100 teachers at this school.

children.name: note_num_tchrs_qualification
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available.
children.label: 34. I would like to learn about the qualifications of the teachers at the school. Please tell me how many of your teachers have the following qualifications:

children.name: num_tchrs_w_nce_plus
children.label: Higher teaching qualifications (such as BSc. Ed., BA Ed., B. Ed., ND/HND with PGDE, BA/BSc with PGDE) BSc or BA

children.name: note_teachers_wrong
children.label: The number of teachers with NCE and higher teaching qualifications cannot exceed the total number of teachers at the school.

children.name: num_sr_staff_total
children.hint: Please enter the total for non-teaching senior staff. Enter 0 if none. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available.
children.label: 35. What is the total number of non-teaching SENIOR staff (pay scale grade 7 and above)

children.name: note_senior_staff_more_10
children.label: Please check again the number of SENIOR staff. You have entered more than 10 Senior staff.

children.name: num_jr_staff_total
children.hint: Please enter the total for non-teaching junior staff. Enter 0 if none.
children.label: 36. What is the total total number of non-teaching JUNIOR staff (pay scale grade 1 to 6)

children.name: note_junior_staff_more_10
children.label: Please check again the number of JUNIOR staff. You have entered more than 10 Junior staff.

children.name: num_tchrs_attended_training
children.hint: Please enter 0 if none were trained. Otherwise enter the number trained in the past year.
children.label: 37. How many teachers have attended any training or workshop or seminar in the past year?

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of teachers attending training should be lower or equal to the total number of teachers.

children.name: num_tchrs_trained_new_curricula
children.hint: Please enter 0 if none were trained
children.label: 38. How many teachers were trained on the use of the new basic education curriculum?

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of teachers attending training should be lower or equal to the total number of teachers.

children.name: proportion_tchr_attend
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 39. Please estimate the proportion of teachers who attend school on a regular school day.

children.name: two_shifts_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 40. Does the school operate in two shifts (morning and afternoon)?

children.name: multigrade_teaching_yn
children.hint: Select no if no teachers teach more than one class at the same time otherwise choose the answer which best describes the situation
children.label: 41. Does the school operate or run more than one class in the same classroom?

children.name: yes_not_enough_teacher
children.label: Yes, because the school does not have enough teachers

children.name: yes_not_enough_space
children.label: Yes, because the school does not have enough space

children.name: yes_no_teacher_no_space
children.label: Yes, due to teacher shortage and space shortage

children.name: fees
children.hint: This includes fees charged by the school AND costs parents pay for independently.
children.label: 42. Which of the following do parents pay for?

children.name: admission_new
children.label: Admission or Enrollment fee for new students

children.name: tuition_cont
children.label: Tuition fee charged for continuing students

children.name: other
children.label: Other education material  (pencils, exercise books, school uniforms, bags etc.)

children.name: recreation
children.label: Sports, games and other recreational fees

children.name: budget_sources
children.hint: Select ALL that apply.

children.name: fed_gov
children.label: Federal government (including ETF, UBE, MDGs etc.)

children.name: budget_sources_other
children.hint: Enter text. Do not leave blank. Enter XXX if the information is not available.
children.label: 43.1 Please specify other source of teacher salaries.

children.name: textbooks_supplied_by
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 44. Who supplies textbooks?

children.name: fed_gov
children.label: Federal government (including ETF, UBE, MDGs etc.)

children.name: textbooks_supplied_by_other
children.hint: Enter text. Do not leave blank. Enter XXX if the information is not available.
children.label: 44.1 Please specify who supplies books.

children.name: school_constr_fed_gov
children.hint: Select ALL that apply.
children.label: 45. Who pays for school construction and renovation?

children.name: fed_gov
children.label: Federal government (including ETF, UBE, MDGs etc.)

children.name: school_constr_fed_gov_other
children.hint: Enter text. Do not leave blank. Enter XXX if the information is not available.
children.label: 45.1 Please specify who pays for school construction and renovation.

children.name: times_tchr_pay_delay_pastyr
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available. If never enter 0.
children.label: 46. How many times has teacher pay been delayed in the past 12 months?

children.name: times_tchr_pay_miss_pastyr
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available. If never enter 0.
children.label: 47. How many times has teacher pay been missed in the last year?

children.name: school_provide_meals_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 48. Does the school provide meals to students?

children.name: functioning_library_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 49. Does the school have a functioning library?

children.name: covered_roof_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 50. Do ALL of the classrooms have a covered roof?

children.name: boundary_wall_fence_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 51. Does the school have a boundary wall or fence?

children.name: health_services_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 52. Does the school have health services for students and staff?

children.name: num_classrms_total
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available. If none enter 0.
children.label: 53. What is the total number of classrooms?

children.name: note_num_classrooms_high
children.label: Please check again the total number of classrooms. The number you have entered is too high.

children.name: num_classrms_good_cond
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available. If none enter 0.
children.label: 54. Out of the total number of classrooms, how many are in good condition?

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of classrooms in good condition should be lower or equal to the total number of classrooms.

children.name: num_classrms_need_min_repairs
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available. If none enter 0.
children.label: 54.1 Out of the total number of classrooms, how many are in need of MINOR repairs?

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of classrooms needing minor repaairs should be lower or equal to the total number of classrooms.

children.name: num_classrms_need_maj_repairs
children.hint: Enter a number. Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available. If none enter 0.
children.label: 54.2 Out of the total number of classrooms, how many are in need of MAJOR repairs?

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of classrooms needing major repairs should be lower or equal to the total number of classrooms.

children.name: note_num_clsssrooms_calculated
children.label: Total number of classrooms in good condition, needing minor repairs and needing major repairs should be less or equal than the total number of classrooms.

children.name: classes_outside_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 55. Are any classes held outside because there are not enough classrooms?

children.name: num_desks
children.hint: Enter 0 if none. Otherwise enter the total number of usable desks.
children.label: 56. What is the total number of usable desks in the school?

children.name: note_num_students_to_desks_high
children.label: Please check again the total number of desks. The number you have entered is too low.

children.name: num_benches
children.hint: Enter 0 if none. Otherwise enter the number of usable benches or chairs.
children.label: 57. What is the total number of usable benches or chairs in the school?

children.name: note_num_students_to_benches_high
children.label: Please check again the total number of benches. The number you have entered is too low.

children.name: num_classrm_w_chalkboard
children.hint: Hint: This should be a proper chalkboard or blackboard. It cannot be black paint put on the wall. Enter 0 if none.
children.label: 58. How many classrooms have a usable chalkboard or blackboard?

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Total number of classrooms with chalkboards should be lower or equal to the total number of classrooms.

bind.relevant: selected(${level_of_education}, 'primary_only') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'preprimary_and_primary') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'primary_and_junior_sec') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'primary_junior_and_senior_sec')

children.name: note_manuals_pry
children.hint: Enter 0 if none. Otherwise enter the number of textbooks.Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available
children.label: 59.1 I would like to ask you some questions about textbooks. How many textbooks does the school have in total for PRY1-PRY6 for the following subjects:

bind.relevant: selected(${level_of_education}, 'juniors_sec_only') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'junior_and_senior_sec') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'primary_and_junior_sec') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'primary_junior_and_senior_sec')

children.name: note_manuals_js
children.hint: Enter 0 if none. Otherwise enter the number of textbooks.Do not leave blank. Enter 999 if the information is not available
children.label: 59.2 I would like to ask you some questions about textbooks. How many textbooks does the school have in total for JS1-JS3 for the following subjects:

children.name: provide_exercise_books_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 60. Does the school provide exercise books to ALL students FOR FREE?

children.name: num_exercise_books_per_student_pry
children.hint: Enter 0 if none. Otherwise enter the number.
children.label: 61.1Total Number of exercise books provided by the school for students in PRY1-PRY6

bind.relevant: ${provide_exercise_books_yn}='yes' and (selected(${level_of_education}, 'primary_only') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'preprimary_and_primary') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'primary_and_junior_sec') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'primary_junior_and_senior_sec'))

children.name: num_exercise_books_per_student_jss
children.hint: Enter 0 if none. Otherwise enter the number.
children.label: 61.2 Total Number of exercise books provided by the school for students in JS1-JS3.

bind.relevant: ${provide_exercise_books_yn}='yes' and (selected(${level_of_education}, 'juniors_sec_only') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'junior_and_senior_sec') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'primary_and_junior_sec') or selected(${level_of_education}, 'primary_junior_and_senior_sec'))

children.name: provide_pens_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 62. Does the school provide pens or pencils to all students FOR FREE?

children.name: use_teach_aids_yn
children.hint: Teaching aids include maps and charts, reference books and supplementary books, flip charts and posters, activity worksheets, picture illustrations and diagrams, etc.
children.label: 63. Are teaching aids used by teachers in this school?

children.name: natl_curriculum_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 64. Does the school have a UBE curriculum for all subjects

children.name: teacher_guide_yn
children.hint: Select ONLY one.
children.label: 65. Does the school provide teacher’s guides for all their teaching subjects?
